original_text: And therefore will the Lord wait, that he may be gracious unto you, and therefore will he be exalted, that he may have mercy upon you: for the Lord is a God of judgment: blessed are all they that wait for him.
korean_text: 그러나 여호와께서 기다리시나니 이는 너희에게 은혜를 베풀려 하심이요 일어나시리니 이는 너희를 긍휼히 여기려 하심이라 대저 여호와는 정의의 하나님이심이라 그를 기다리는 자마다 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: And therefore will the Lord wait
that he may be gracious unto you
and therefore will he be exalted
that he may have mercy upon you
for the Lord is a God of judgment
blessed are all they that wait for him
